description:
She's nowhere to be found and he's the only one who can save her.

Kaboom!
The explosion wrecked the entire universe. One might even say that it's...broken. Roco with the help of ragtag group of scientists needs to protect his ship from incoming attacks. 

Strategize

Help Roco reach his goal and destroy the enemy waves in this unique tower defence game. Your brain is your biggest weapon. Decide where to land and how to fight your way out of enemy's hands. 

Tons of goodies

Block all paths or guide monsters down a long line of fire. Find out which towers and barriers are the best for your unique playstyle.

Key features:

- Dozens of towers and barriers to chose from
- Cute aesthetic
- Simple gameplay loop
- Interesting Story Mode
- Unique maps and challenges
- Giant game changing monsters
name: Broken Universe -  Tower Defense
